title: @Riot I accidently disenchanted death sworn ward skin
body: I thought I was unlocking the ward skin only to see it not appear in my ward skins in pre-game lobby. I was wondering if I can get it back somehow?

replies.body: Hey we might be able to look into this for you and find some options.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can check it out!
